main event: Various observers reported watching a large cloud-like object that was yellow to blue in color and looked like a cloud before growing up into an elongated trail. The object looked like two big oblong platters.
interesting points: The object was flushed with a slight white light.
The object was kept at 2,200 feet above the ground.
There was a contrast between the clarity of the object and the two 27-inch diameter platters that were witnessed.
The object was compared in size to two circular disks over a full moon.
